Flex Basis

# Flex Basis

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class              | Support        |
| ------------------ | -------------- |
| ```
basis-{n}
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
basis-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
basis-auto
``` | 🌐 Web only    |
